name: Clouds Vs Doughnuts
description:
-Submission To The 56th MiniJam-

Congratulations On Your Promotion! Only Problem Now Is That We're At War With The Doughnuts... And You're Being Put On The Front Lines.

Collect Sprinkles To Obtain  Towers In Order To Fight Off The Enemy. Your Goal Is To Make It All The Way To Wave 15, In Order To Scare Off Those  Small Fried Cakes!

Music By:

Komiku - Poupies Theme

Komiku - Poupies Great Adventure - The Arcade Game

Komiku - WIN

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku
